Variety of solutions.l1: We provide variety of solutions for access control

Transforming Real Estate.l1: Are you tired of the time-consuming process of visiting potential apartments for rent?
Transforming Real Estate.l1-1: So are we. That's why we've created an entirely new approach to real estate viewings.
Transforming Real Estate.l2: Our solution, Doorstep View, uses cutting-edge IoT and AI technologies to streamline your apartment viewing process. No more inconvenient scheduling or wasted journeys.

How It Works.l1: With IoT, we automate the process of visiting available apartments for rent. Our system allows real estate agencies to remotely control doors and manage the viewing process, all without any changes to regular doors.
How It Works.l2: And with AI, we elevate your customer experience. Our AI system provides personalized recommendations based on your preferences and behavior, making the search for your perfect home that much easier.

2.c: The Danalock V3 is a wireless smart lock that lets you easily control access to your home with your smartphone. So stop worrying about lost or forgotten keys, use your smartphone to lock or unlock the door

Why Choose Us.l1: The real estate market in the Kingdom is rapidly growing, with high demand for rental apartments. But the process of visiting these apartments is outdated and inconvenient. That's where we come in. Our innovative solution streamlines the rental process and improves your customer experience. And the best part? There's no competition like us in the Kingdom.
